snippet: Teenagers once rose to the top of the professional ranks. But tennis is a sport for adults today, and everyone is benefiting.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Tennis column observes that teenagers once rose to top ranks of professional tennis, but current trend is that sport is being dominated by those who have reached full-blown young adulthood, as evidenced by United States Open singles finals.
lead_paragraph: Teenagers once rose to the top of the professional ranks. But tennis is a sport for adults today, and everyone is benefiting.

headline.main: Once the Sport of Teenagers, Tennis Grows Older and Stronger
headline.print_headline: Once the Sport of Teenagers, Tennis Grows Older and Stronger
